title: Bomber

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Plant a fuse at someone's house each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players will not know when a fuse is placed on their house.
- If a player with a fuse is attacked, the violence of the event will trigger the fuse.
- Each fuse will dissolve two nights after it was placed.
- The town will be notified when a fuse has been triggered.
- Your bomb will detonate three days after the fuse is triggered, killing everyone in the town except Peasants and players who win expressly with Peasants (meaning Town and REF will die, but Peasants and roles that can only win with Peasants are spared).
- When you die, your fuses dissolve, and the detonation will be prevented.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.

desc:
Post 4443
*He could build traps, but when has the Trapper ever received as much glory as the Vigilante? Traps would bite down - then what? He needed blood. He needed carnage. He spent day and night tinkering in his basement - his vision was focused on solely the bomb. The screws, wood, and pipes clanged against the floor as he continued his master project, and at last he was finished.*
